attributes.action: Give Priority council housing to working people.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The present system gives priority council housing to single mums, drug/alchohol addicts, unemployed and asylum seekers.  These people get their rents and council taxes paid and thus get a free house at other council tax payers expence. Priority housing should be given to those who are in employement and thus pay their own way.
